member.name: T:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo
member.summary: Class for holding information for an OracleCommand.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the OracleQueryInfo class. Defaults to a CommandType of text.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the OracleQueryInfo class. Defaults to a CommandType of text.
member.param: Command text.
Connection string of the Oracle database.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the OracleQueryInfo class. Defaults to a CommandType of text.
member.param: Command text.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
Oracle parameters to use for the command.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.AddParameter(Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter)
member.summary: Adds an Oracle parameter for use with the OracleCommand.
member.param: Oracle parameter to add.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.AddParameter(System.Object,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleDbType,System.Data.ParameterDirection)
member.summary: Adds an Oracle Parameter for use with the OracleCommand.
member.param: Value of the parameter.
Type of the parameter.
Direction of the parameter.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.AddParameters(Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Adds an array of Oracle Parameters for use with the OracleCommand.
member.param: Array of Oracle parameters to add.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text for the Oracle command.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string for the Oracle command.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.CommandType
member.summary: Gets or sets the CommandType of the Oracle command.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.TableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name to assign to the DataTable.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.Parameters
member.summary: Gets an array of Oracle parameters to use with the Oracle command.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo.LogString
member.summary: Builds a string to write to a log file.
member.returns: String to write to a log file.

member.name: T:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse
member.summary: Stores information about the results from an Oracle transaction.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.#ctor(GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResultType)
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the OracleResponse class.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.SetException(System.Exception)
member.summary:
Sets the exception property for an exception that occurs during the Oracle transaction.
Sets any additional associated information if the exception is an OracleException.
member.param: Exception to set.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the error code from the OracleException generated during the Oracle transaction.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets the error message from the OracleException generated during the Oracle transaction.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception that occurred during the Oracle transaction.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ResultType
member.summary: Gets the type of result being returned.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ResultsRow
member.summary: Gets the resulting DataRow contained in the response.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ResultsTable
member.summary: Gets the resulting DataTable contained in the response.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ResultsSet
member.summary: Gets the resulting DataSet contained in the response.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ReturnParameters
member.summary: Gets a string/object key value list of out parameters for stored procedure call.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.ExecutionTime
member.summary: Gets the execution time of the Oracle command.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.Results
member.summary: Gets the resulting data of the Oracle transaction.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.HasResults
member.summary: Gets whether or not the response contains a valid result.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResponse.Successful
member.summary: Gets whether or not the Oracle transaction was successful.

member.name: T:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResultType
member.summary: Declares the type of result being returned in the Oracle response object.

member.name: F:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResultType.DataRow
member.summary: Indicates the response will contain a DataRow.

member.name: F:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResultType.DataTable
member.summary: Indicates the response will contain a DataTable.

member.name: F:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResultType.DataSet
member.summary: Indicates the response will contain a DataSet.

member.name: F:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleResultType.None
member.summary: Indicates the response is not expected to return any results.

member.name: T:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker
member.summary: Contains methods for interacting with an Oracle database.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.#cctor
member.summary: Static constructor for the OracleWorker class.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataRow(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the first row from the results.
member.param: Query string to execute.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataRow(System.String,System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the first row from the results.
member.param: Query string to execute.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
Oracle parameter to pass to the query.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataRow(System.String,System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the first row from the results.
member.param: Query string to execute.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
Oracle parameters to pass to the query.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataRow(GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the first row from the results.
member.param: Information about the Oracle query and connection.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataTable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Query string to execute.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataTable(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Query string to execute.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
Maximum records to return. Pass a non-positive integer to return all results.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataTable(System.String,System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Query string to execute.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
Oracle parameters to pass to the query.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataTable(System.String,System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Query string to execute.
Connection string of the Oracle database.
Oracle parameters to pass to the query.
Maximum records to return. Pass a non-positive integer to return all results.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataTable(GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Information about the Oracle query and connection.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataTable(GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and returns the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Information about the Oracle query and connection.
Maximum number of records to return.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryDataSet(GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo[])
member.summary: Executes Oracle queries and returns all resulting DataTables in a single DataSet.
member.param: Array of commands to execute.
member.returns: OracleResponse object containing information about the results of the query execution.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryEnumerable(System.String,System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and iterates over the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Query text to send to Oracle.
Connection string of the database to query.
Values to assign to the bind variables of the query string.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.QueryEnumerable(GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo)
member.summary: Executes an Oracle query and iterates over the resulting DataTable.
member.param: Information about the Oracle query and connection.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.CallProcedure(System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Executes a stored procedure and returns an OracleResponse object containing the execution results.
member.param: Name of the stored procedure to execute.
Oracle parameters to pass to the stored procedure.
member.returns: OracleResponse containing the results of the stored procedure call.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.CallProcedure(GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleCommandInfo)
member.summary: Executes a stored procedure and returns an OracleResponse object containing the execution results.
member.param: Information about the command to execute.
member.returns: OracleResponse containing the results of the stored procedure call.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.BuildDataTable(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Builds a DataTable object representing the results of an Oracle query.
member.param: DataTable containing schema information about the data returned.
member.returns: DataTable object representing the structure of the results of an Oracle query.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.SetParameters(Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleCommand,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Sets the parameters on an OracleCommand.
member.param: OracleCommand to set parameters on.
Oracle parameters to assign to the command.

member.name: M:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.BuildParameter(System.Object,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleDbType,System.Data.ParameterDirection)
member.summary: Builds an Oracle Parameter to pass in an OracleCommand.
member.param: Value of the parameter.
Type of the parameter.
Direction of the parameter.
member.returns: Oracle Parameter generated with the provided settings.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.Logger
member.summary: Gets the OracleWorker class logger.

member.name: P:GDDatabaseClient.Oracle.OracleWorker.CurrentThreadId
member.summary: Gets the thread ID of the current thread.
